casebody.data:
Ball
v.
Ellis 225P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2016 James M. Ellis, Attorney at Law, Black Mountain, for Ellis, James M. Charles Anthony Ball, for Ball, Charles Anthony.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of June 2016 by Plaintiff for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of June 2016."
